description: Disgraced FIFA officials, suspended UEFA chief Michel Platini and Barcelona superstar Lionel Messi were among the names found on Sunday in leaked documents that reveal offshore financial dealings.
text:
Disgraced FIFA officials, suspended UEFA chief Michel Platini and Barcelona superstar Lionel Messi were among the names found on Sunday in leaked documents that reveal offshore financial dealings.
The "Panama Papers" claim the law firm of a FIFA ethics watchdog had business relationships with three men recently indicted in soccer's global corruption scandal.
Documents also bring to light how some players use offshore companies to bank money from marketing deals.
title: Leaked files show offshore dealings

aida.originalText:
Leaked files show offshore dealings. Disgraced FIFA officials, suspended UEFA chief Michel Platini and Barcelona superstar Lionel Messi were among the names found on Sunday in leaked documents that reveal offshore financial dealings.. Disgraced FIFA officials, suspended UEFA chief Michel Platini and Barcelona superstar Lionel Messi were among the names found on Sunday in leaked documents that reveal offshore financial dealings.
The "Panama Papers" claim the law firm of a FIFA ethics watchdog had business relationships with three men recently indicted in soccer's global corruption scandal.
Documents also bring to light how some players use offshore companies to bank money from marketing deals.
